animeDescription: Virtua Fighter: Costomize Clip is a collection of music videos telling the stories behind some characters of the series. The songs featured in this OVA are from the Virtua Fighter 2 Dancing Shadows image album.
animeCharacters: ['Yuki, Akira', 'Chan, Pai', 'Bryant, Sarah', 'Bryant, Jacky', 'Hawkfield, Wolf', 'Rafale, Leon']
